title: bigpugcore
author: bigpugcore
content: Following the recent spike and attraction to the newly launched core chain (Layer 2), there has been sustainable and quality launches on the chain. The success from these project has birthed the launch of BIG PUG CORE. The crypto project, called BigPug Core, is a comprehensive platform that offers users advanced charting tools, a launchpad for new projects, staking options, and revenue generation on the core chain.The platform is designed to be user-friendly, accessible, and highly functional, making it a valuable resource for both novice and experienced crypto traders. Core features include:Chart Tool Bot: Helps traders to make informed trading decisions.Launchpad: Allows new projects to launch their tokens and raise funds from a large pool of investors.Staking: Allows users to earn rewards in the form of new tokens, trading fees, or other incentives.Revenue Generation: Provides users with an additional source of income.SOCIALSWebsite: https://bigpugcore.com/Telegram: https://t.me/bigpugcoreTwitter: https://twitter.com/BigPugCore/
